content: the linen or moss or seed or granite stitch has become a popular choice for baby blankets and it s easy to see why a little quicker than a purely single crocheted blanket the linen stitch still provides a solid and modern-looking fabric safe for those little baby fingers the linen stitch is very basic so it s left up to the crocheter to decide how to spruce it up with color i actually got the inspiration for this blanket from one of my son s newborn socks what can i say you never know when inspiration will strike visual learner take a look at the video tutorial for extra help
